General.Name: Cachet Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Cachet Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail sale of pharmaceutical products in China. It is involved in the supply of medicines to hospitals; wholesale of biological products, medical instruments, and traditional Chinese medicines; pharmaceutical logistic operations; and manufacture of medicines. The company owns 150 chain stores in Beijing that sell medicines, health care foods, medical instruments, cosmetics, daily necessities, and traditional Chinese medicines. Cachet Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xinxia  Wang
1.Title: CFO, VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
